subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Brandt Snedeker shot a 65 and shared the lead with Arjun Atwal at 12-under-par 128 after two rounds of the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C.
snippet: Brandt Snedeker shot a 65 and shared the lead with Arjun Atwal at 12-under-par 128 after two rounds of the Wyndham Championship in Greensboro, N.C.
